SEARCH
Package src.team

Class Team

java.lang.Object
src.team.Team
public class Team extends Object
Represents a team consisting of athletes.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Team(String teamName, ArrayList<Athlete> athletes)
    Creates a new instance of the Team class with the specified team name and list of athletes.

  • Constructor Details

    • Team

      public Team(String teamName, ArrayList<Athlete> athletes)
      Creates a new instance of the Team class with the specified team name and list of athletes.
      Parameters:
      teamName - the name of the team
      athletes - the list of athletes in the team

  • Method Details

    • getTeamName

      public String getTeamName()
      Gets the name of the team.
      Returns:
      the team name

    • setTeamName

      public void setTeamName(String teamName)
      Sets the name of the team.
      Parameters:
      teamName - the new team name

    • addAthlete

      public void addAthlete(Athlete athlete)
      Adds an athlete to the team. If the team is already full, the excess athlete is stored separately.
      Parameters:
      athlete - the athlete to add

    • setAthlete

      public void setAthlete(int selectedIndex, int currentIndex)
      Sets the athlete at the specified index with the athlete at the current index. If the current index is greater than 4, the excess athlete is swapped.
      Parameters:
      selectedIndex - the index of the athlete to be set
      currentIndex - the current index of the athlete

    • getEquippedAthletes

      public ArrayList<Athlete> getEquippedAthletes()
      Gets the list of equipped athletes in the team.
      Returns:
      the list of equipped athletes

    • getExcessAthlete

      public Athlete getExcessAthlete()
      Gets the excess athlete which is not part of the main equipped athletes list.
      Returns:
      the excess athlete

    • removeExcessAthlete

      public void removeExcessAthlete()
      sets the excessAthlete to null

    • getStatTotal

      public int getStatTotal()
      Calculates and returns the total stat value of all equipped athletes in the team.
      Returns:
      the total stat value of the team

    • containsAthlete

      public Boolean containsAthlete(Athlete athlete)
      Checks if the team contains the specified athlete, either in the equipped athletes list or as the excess athlete.
      Parameters:
      athlete - the athlete to check
      Returns:
      true if the team contains the athlete, false otherwise
